name: Linda's Cases: Brighton Secrets
description:
In Brighton mysteriously disappears Evelyn Stanford. Her best friend, police inspector Linda Jones, is coming back to her hometown to solve the mystery of her disappearance.
Enjoy searching for items. Resolve all quests and find your way to their best kept secrets. Different game modes, visual effects, cleverly hidden objects and increasing difficulty will make your adventure nice, relaxing and challenging.

● Hidden object adventure game
● 90 hidden object scenes
● 16 unique locations
● Premium version. No ads and extra payments.
● Over 500 objects hidden in the game
● Different play modes: Picture, Silhouette, Word, etc.
● Zoomable scenes
● New visual effects, HD quality of graphics
● Amazing sound effects
● Climatic music closely related with the theme of the game
